title: 这个指令怎么打？
txt_content: 生成一个刷怪笼，刷的是掉落沙，掉落沙是石砖块，最小帧率40，最大40，刷新范围7，触发范围30，实体数量20，一次2个

replies.author: 小白勇者
replies.txt_content: 您好,之前回答的二位命令都有错误,正确的命令分别为setblock x y z mob_spawner 0 replace  {EntityId:FallingSand,SpawnData:{Time:1,Block:stonebrick},MinSpawnDelay:40,MaxSpawnDelay:40,SpawnRange:7,RequiredPlayerRange:30,MaxNearbyEntities:20,SpawnCount:2}和give @p mob_spawner 1 0 {BlockEntityTag:{EntityId:FallingSand,SpawnData:{Time:1,Block:stonebrick},MinSpawnDelay:40,MaxSpawnDelay:40,SpawnRange:7,RequiredPlayerRange:30,MaxNearbyEntities:20,SpawnCount:2}},若您还有任何其它疑问请向我发送消息,我会尽量为您解答。

FHC红石 发表于 2015-3-25 19:50
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-210097-1-1.html
你能帮我打出来吗？这样我们双管齐下，做地图更快
@小白勇者

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
12313131 发表于 2015-3-25 20:02
你能帮我打出来吗？这样我们双管齐下，做地图更快
@小白勇者
2333333我没空，还是叫小白勇者吧

replies.author: Lexx
replies.txt_content:
/give @p minecraft_mob_spawner 1 0 {EntityId:FallingSand,MinSpawnDelay:40,MaxSpawnDelay:40,SpawnRange:7,RequiredPlayerRange:30,MaxNearbyEntities:20,SpawnCount:2,tag:{Tile:minecraft_stonebrick}}

不知道怎么往掉落沙添加方块标签……
